title: Industrial Warehouse Complex
description: Complete Tekla modeling for a 5,000 sq.m industrial warehouse featuring heavy crane beams, mezzanine floors, and complex bracing systems. Delivered full GA drawings and shop detail drawings.
details: Multi-span portal frames with 20T crane capacity. Included secondary members, purlins, girts, and complete connection detailing.

title: PEB Factory Building
description: Pre-Engineered Building model for a manufacturing facility with clear span design, canopy extensions, and optimized member sizing for cost-effective fabrication.
details: Clear span of 40m with tapered members. Custom macro used for purlin spacing optimization.

title: Commercial Office Tower Steel
description: Structural steel modeling for a 12-story commercial building including composite deck connections, moment frames, and seismic bracing.
details: Complex multi-level framing with over 2,000 unique parts. Fully detailed shop and erection drawings with bolt schedules.

title: Pipe Rack & Access Platforms
description: Modeling of an extensive pipe rack system for a petrochemical facility including pipe supports, access platforms, ladders, and handrails.
details: Over 150 linear meters of pipe support structure with variable height bents and transverse frames. Clash detection with piping models.

title: PEB Warehouse with Mezzanine
description: Pre-engineered building with integrated mezzanine for a logistics hub featuring loading dock steel structures and canopy framing.
details: 60m x 30m footprint with 10m eave height. Internal mezzanine designed for 5 kN/mÂ² live load.

title: Heavy Industrial Plant Structure
description: Complex industrial plant structure with equipment platforms, conveyor supports, and heavy bracing for dynamic loading conditions.
details: Multi-level equipment support structure with vibration isolation detailing and hot-dip galvanized connections.
